name: site-professionnel
description: Projet site professionnel avec CV, parcours et comp√©tences.

scripts.minify-html: npx html-minifier-terser "index.html" -o "dist/index.html" --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css true --minify-js true && npx html-minifier-terser "politique-confidentialite.html" -o "dist/politique-confidentialite.html" --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css true --minify-js true && npx html-minifier-terser "remerciement-formulaire.html" -o "dist/remerciement-formulaire.html" --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css true --minify-js true
scripts.minify-css-style: postcss css/style.css -o dist/style.css && postcss dist/style.css --use postcss-clean -o dist/style.min.css
scripts.minify-js: npx terser "assets/js/intlTelInput.js" -o "dist/intlTelInput.min.js" --compress --mangle && npx terser "js/scripts-critical.js" -o "dist/scripts-critical.min.js" --compress --mangle && npx terser "js/scripts-non-critical.js" -o "dist/scripts-non-critical.min.js" --compress --mangle && npx terser "assets/js/owl.carousel.min.js" -o "dist/owl.carousel.min.js" --compress --mangle
scripts.copy-assets: cp -r images dist/ && cp -r assets/img dist/ && cp -r docs dist/ && cp assets/css/intlTelInput.css dist/ && cp assets/css/intlTelInput.min.css dist/ && cp assets/css/owl.carousel.css dist/ && cp assets/css/owl.carousel.min.css dist/ && cp assets/js/intlTelInput.js dist/ && cp assets/js/intlTelInput.min.js dist/ && cp assets/js/owl.carousel.js dist/ && cp assets/js/owl.carousel.min.js dist/ && cp _headers dist/ && cp politique-confidentialite.html dist/ && cp remerciement-formulaire.html dist/ || true
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && npm run minify-html && npm run minify-css-style && npm run minify-css-owl && npm run minify-js && npm run copy-assets
